message: Hi Bob, I'm offering this product to you today for $12,000. I think it would be very valuable to you given your needs.
I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $9,500. Can we meet in the middle?
I appreciate your interest, Bob.  While $9,500 is a fair offer, the value of this product to me is quite high. Could you consider $11,000?
I'm still interested in the product, but $11,000 is a bit steep for me. Would you be willing to meet me at $9,800?
